effect.ruby_sapphire: User pays half its max HP to raise its Attack to +6 stages. If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.
effect.emerald: User pays half its max HP to raise its Attack to +6 stages. If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.
effect.firered_leafgreen: User pays half its max HP to raise its Attack to +6 stages. If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.
effect.colosseum: User pays half its max HP to raise its Attack to +6 stages. If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.
effect.xd: User pays half its max HP to raise its Attack to +6 stages. If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.
short_effect.emerald: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.
short_effect.colosseum: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.
short_effect.xd: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.

flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user maximizes its ATTACK stat at the cost of half its full HP.
